title: Boris Johnson – 2018 Speech at Paris Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Boris Johnson, the Foreign Secretary, at the Paris Conference on chemical weapons held on 18 May 2018.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/borisjohnson-1-300x300.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/borisjohnson-1.jpg)

We gather at a moment when the rules that guarantee the security of every country – including the global ban on chemical weapons – are gravely imperilled.
